author: Cody Thompson
title: Gov. DeWine announces 2024-2026 Suicide Prevention Plan
text:
This story mentions suicide. If you or someone you know is struggling with suicidal thoughts, you can call or text 988. For more resources, click here.
OHIO â€” Gov. Mike DeWine has announced the stateâ€™s 2024-2026 Suicide Prevention Plan, according to a press release from his office.
What You Need To Know Gov. Mike DeWine has announced the stateâ€™s 2024-2026 Suicide Prevention Plan
The plan is a partnership between DeWineâ€™s RecoveryOhio initiative and the Ohio Suicide Prevention Foundation
The plan, which received input from 30 different organizations, will focus on raising awareness, improving data, expand access to health care and provide support to those who have lost someone to suicide
If you or someone you know is struggling with thoughts of suicide, you can call or text 988 The plan, the release states, is a partnership between DeWineâ€™s RecoveryOhio initiative and the Ohio Suicide Prevention Foundation that seeks to â€œpromote life-saving strategies statewide.â€
â€œThe heartbreak of losing a family member to suicide is a pain that cuts deep, leaving behind a void that words can't fully capture,â€œ DeWine said in the release. â€œThis plan will bring about a system-wide commitment to reduce suicides and encourage communities to work collectively to foster understanding and destigmatize mental health challenges.â€
The plan, which received input from 30 different organizations, will focus on raising awareness, improving data, expand access to health care and provide support to those who have lost someone to suicide, according to the release.
â€œIt underscores the importance of collaborative efforts with behavioral health care providers, employers, health care systems, schools, and community organizations to stem the increasing rates of suicides,â€ the release states.
The release cites data from the Ohio Department of Health , saying Ohio saw 1,766 suicides in 2021, an 8% increase from 2020. The year 2018 saw the highest in a decade with 1,836.
The release also cited national data from the Centers for Disease Control , reporting nearly 50,000 deaths by suicide in 2022, with middle-aged adults being the highest cohort.
â€œWe are grateful for Governor DeWineâ€™s leadership and focus on improving the lives of individuals who are struggling with mental health and suicide,â€ said Tony Coder, executive director of the Ohio Suicide Prevention Foundation, in the release. â€œWe believe that suicide prevention is a health issue that anyone can be an active participant in and we are grateful that this plan is a strategy that can help more individuals seek care.â€
Related Stories Public Health Fund of Ohio awards $350,000 in funding for suicide prevention strategies
Report shows suicides increased in Ohio in 2021

author: AFP
title: Tourists warned of water shortage on Koh Phi Phi Islands in Thailand amidst scorching heatwave | Travel - Hindustan Times
text: The dazzling Thai holiday islands made famous by Hollywood film "The Beach" are facing a severe water shortage following a blistering heatwave across Asia, a tourism official and locals said Thursday.The Koh Phi Phi archipelago, off the west coast of southern Thailand, draws hundreds of thousands of visitors to its pristine beaches and turquoise waters each year.But a deadly heatwave that has sent temperature records tumbling across the region in recent weeks -- as well as a prolonged spell of low rainfall -- has seen reservoirs run low."The private company that provides water to the islands may have to stop the supply," Wichupan Phukaoluan Srisanya, president of the Krabi Hotel Association, which represents hotels in the area, told AFP.Island authorities have discussed shipping in water from the mainland if the dry weather continues, she said, but would hold off in the hope of the wet season arriving in May."But we want to assure tourists who are planning to visit the islands that we can manage this," Wichupan added.Residents who asked not to be named told AFP they had suffered fresh water shortages for months, and said some hotels had limited bookings as a result.And online posts by returning tourists warned travellers to "check if their accommodation has fresh water" ahead of their stay.One wrote on review site TripAdvisor that "tap water has stopped running", as island water reservoirs had been dry since the end of April.Scientists have long warned human-induced climate change will produce more frequent, longer and more intense heatwaves.While the El Nino phenomenon is helping drive this year's exceptionally warm weather, Asia is also warming faster than the global average, according to the UN's World Meteorological Organisation.Local tourism operators have repeatedly called for long-term water supply investments for the Koh Phi Phi islands, which lack sufficient reservoirs and infrastructure.In the Gulf of Thailand, Koh Samui -- another hugely popular tourist island -- has been experiencing similar dry, hot weather but the local tourism board said visitors had not been impacted."We have enough from a water truck, but it increases the cost of running hotels by three times more," the president of Koh Samui Tourism Association Ratchaparon Poolsawadee told AFP.The extreme recent heat has blasted Asia, triggering heatstroke deaths, school closures and desperate prayers for cooling rain.For around a week in April, Bangkok authorities gave daily extreme heat warnings as the heat index -- which takes into account other factors including humidity -- topped 52 degrees Celsius (125 degrees Fahrenheit).

text:
Descubren cÃ³mo el aire contaminado puede causar cÃ¡ncer de pulmÃ³n
Los tumores de los no fumadores que viven en entornos contaminados tienen mÃ¡s mutaciones
Rafa LÃ³pez
SegÃºn un estudio publicado ayer en Nature, la contaminaciÃ³n atmosfÃ©rica podrÃ­a estar directamente implicada en los casos de cÃ¡ncer de pulmÃ³n en personas que nunca han fumado, que son el 25% de los diagnÃ³sticos.
La investigaciÃ³n, cuyo primer firmante es el gallego Marcos DÃ­az Gay, del Centro Nacional de Investigaciones OncolÃ³gicas (CNIO), analizÃ³ el genoma de tumores pulmonares de 871 personas no fumadoras de cuatro continentes. Los no fumadores que vivÃ­an en entornos mÃ¡s contaminados presentaron un nÃºmero mucho mayor de mutaciones relacionadas con el tabaquismo (3,9 veces mÃ¡s) y el envejecimiento (un 76% mÃ¡s). Esto no significa que la contaminaciÃ³n provoque una Â«firma mutacional de contaminaciÃ³n atmosfÃ©ricaÂ» Ãºnica per se, sino que aumenta el nÃºmero total de mutaciones, explica DÃ­az-Gay, antiguo investigador en la Universidad de California de Ludmil Alexandrov, codirector de este estudio.
Â«El artÃ­culo aporta mÃ¡s evidencia sobre el posible mecanismo carcinogÃ©nico de la contaminaciÃ³n ambiental en el cÃ¡ncer de pulmÃ³nÂ», dice a SMC Alberto Ruano, catedrÃ¡tico de Medicina Preventiva de la USC, que echa en falta en este estudio una menciÃ³n al Â«segundo factor de riesgo del cÃ¡ncer de pulmÃ³n segÃºn la OMS, como es la exposiciÃ³n a radÃ³nÂ».

What Makes LeapEngine Different?LeapEngine has recently signed a licensed agreement with a cutting-edge AI tool developer to deliver dynamically modified product catalog images and hyper-targeted content. By analyzing customer behavior, this technology helps to optimize your content for your target audience based on specific interests, demographics, and characteristics. In addition to social media management, the company offers digital marketing services in search engine optimization, conversion rate optimization, and outreach marketing. One satisfied customer said: â€œAya understands our brand and goals which is a very unique quality in the agency space. She is an unbelievably elite marketer who is always bringing new ideas, tests, and opportunities to the table that have successfully grown our business.â€ Build a unique story for your brand with LeapEngine. Visit https://leapengine.co/ today to find out more. author: @infoitinterno
title: Freddo e Crudo Inverno, La Svolta Gelida in Arrivo
text:
Freddo e Crudo Inverno, La Svolta Gelida in Arrivo
Articolo Precedente
Articolo Successivo
L'inizio del 2025 Ã¨ stato caratterizzato da un clima mite, grazie alla persistente protezione fornita dall'anticiclone delle Azzorre, che ha garantito condizioni di tempo stabile quasi ovunque. Tuttavia, gli ultimi aggiornamenti dei Centri di Calcolo hanno sostanzialmente confermato la data per una svolta gelida che potrebbe riportare il crudo inverno su gran parte del nostro Paese. Con l'attenuazione dell'anticiclone, si prevede un cambiamento significativo nella circolazione atmosferica, con l'arrivo di correnti umide e miti da sudovest che porteranno neve sulle Alpi, ma solo a quote montane, e piogge e rovesci a tratti in veloci passaggi perturbati.
Sta transitando in queste ore un fronte freddo con traiettoria nordovest-sudest, di moderata intensitÃ  e piuttosto veloce, che giÃ  al nordovest ha lasciato spazio a schiarite. Tuttavia, il resto del Paese Ã¨ invitato a seguire l'evoluzione del fronte tramite radar, poichÃ© l'Epifania sarÃ  segnata da maltempo, con piogge, neve e forti venti. Fino al 6 gennaio, l'Italia sarÃ  attraversata da venti, piogge e neve, in attesa poi di una possibile ondata di gelo artico in quota.
La prima perturbazione dell'anno, proveniente dal Nord Atlantico, sta giÃ  influenzando il meteo su alcune aree del nostro Paese, interrompendo la fase di stabilitÃ  garantita dall'anticiclone delle Azzorre. Per l'Epifania si prevedono nubi, neve, Maestrale e freddo proveniente dalle regioni polari. Le previsioni per i prossimi giorni indicano un peggioramento delle condizioni meteorologiche, con piogge sull'Emilia Romagna, poi al Centro e quindi in Campania.
Il clima mite dovuto all'anticiclone delle Azzorre Ã¨ ormai un ricordo dell'anno passato. Con il nuovo anno arriva anche il maltempo: pioggia, neve e freddo.

"Le pido el favor a la directora del ICBF y al seÃ±or presidente Gustavo Petro para que nos den claridad de cuÃ¡ndo podremos tener a nuestros niÃ±os en los centros de Desarrollo Infantil", sostuvo.

De igual forma el alcalde de Rionegro, Jorge Rivas, informÃ³ sobre la realizaciÃ³n de una carta dirigida, tanto al presidente de la RepÃºblica Gustavo Petro, como a la directora del Bienestar Familiar, Astrid CÃ¡ceres, en la que se reitera la urgencia de destinar los recursos necesarios para garantizar la protecciÃ³n y el desarrollo de la primera infancia, ademÃ¡s de su seguridad alimentaria: "invito a los alcaldes del Oriente de Antioquia y a los agentes educativos para que demos pronto soluciÃ³n a la problemÃ¡tica".
La AlcaldÃ­a de Rionegro reitera el llamado para obtener una respuesta a corto plazo y acciones concretas "que aseguren un futuro digno para los menores".
Cabe hacer menciÃ³n que este es el segundo llamado que se hace desde Rionegro al ICBF, ya que el pasado 6 de febrero de 2025, en un comunicado seÃ±alaban que desde el aÃ±o 2024, la administraciÃ³n municipal presentÃ³ al Instituto Colombiano de Bienestar Familiar (ICBF) una propuesta de inversiÃ³n por nueve mil millones de pesos para mejorar las condiciones laborales de las agentes educativas.
Le puede interesar: Norte de Santander: gobernador pide la intervenciÃ³n de Petro frente a la situaciÃ³n en el Catatumbo
La cual fue rechazada por el ICBF argumentando la no viabilidad en su implementaciÃ³n a nivel nacional. â€œEsta decisiÃ³n desconoce la realidad del municipio y las necesidades urgentes de nuestra comunidad, afectando directamente tanto la calidad de la atenciÃ³n a la infancia como las condiciones laborales de quienes desempeÃ±an esta importante laborâ€, seÃ±alaron en su momento desde la administraciÃ³n municipal de Rionegro.

Der Plan der US-Regierung fÃ¼r Samstag sieht eine gigantische Show der eigenen StÃ¤rke in Washington, DC vor. â€Wir haben Panzer, Flugzeuge, wir haben alles mÃ¶glicheâ€œ, schwÃ¤rmte Donald Trump bereits im Vorfeld Ã¼ber die geplante MilitÃ¤rparade. Die USA seien das einzige Land, das seinen Sieg im Zweiten Weltkrieg nicht feiern wÃ¼rde. â€Ich habe andere LÃ¤nder angerufen. Alle feiern es. Dabei sind wir diejenigen, die den Krieg gewonnen haben. Ohne uns wÃ¼rden Sie alle sonst heute Deutsch sprechen. Vielleicht wÃ¼rden Sie auch Japanisch sprechen.â€œ
Donald Trump bekommt die lang ersehnte MilitÃ¤rparade zum Geburtstag
Die MilitÃ¤rparade in Washington DC an Donald Trumps Geburtstag ist der HÃ¶hepunkt der Feier zu Ehren des US-MilitÃ¤rs, die bereits seit Montag (7. Juni) laufen. Der amtierende US-PrÃ¤sident hatte bereits nach seinem Sieg bei der

Die BehÃ¶rden des â€District of Colombiaâ€œ hatten das aber verhindert, weil Kosten und logistischer Aufwand als zu hoch eingeschÃ¤tzt wurden. Nun aber bekommt Donald Trump seine MilitÃ¤rparade. Doch die anhaltenden

Laut einem Bericht der New York Times mache man sich auch innerhalb der Republikaner groÃŸe Sorgen, die Bilder von Panzern und Soldaten in der US-Hauptstadt kÃ¶nnten im Angesicht der Unruhen in Kalifornien ein falsches Bild erzeugen. Es kÃ¶nne der Eindruck entstehen, die US-Armee wÃ¼rde den Sieg Ã¼ber die eigene BevÃ¶lkerung feiern. â€Das unglÃ¼ckliche Zusammentreffen der Parade und des Einsatzes der Nationalgarde in Kalifornien wird sich verhÃ¤ngnisvoll anfÃ¼hlenâ€œ, sagte Kori Schake, ehemaliger Verteidigungsbeamter in der Regierung von George W. Bush, gegenÃ¼ber der US-Zeitung.

Das wiederum dÃ¼rfte Donald Trump aber nicht abschrecken. Der amtierende US-PrÃ¤sident ist ein Meister der Selbstinszenierung und wird die MilitÃ¤rparade am 14. Laut der Website der Veranstaltung will das Staatsoberhaupt â€250 Jahre auÃŸergewÃ¶hnliche Dienste, bedeutende Errungenschaften und ein bleibendes VermÃ¤chtnis der US-Armeeâ€œ ehren.
Offiziell sind die Feierlichkeiten und der Soldatenaufmarsch in Washington DC aber nicht fÃ¼r Donald Trumps Geburtstag gedacht. Geehrt wird am â€nationalen Flaggentagâ€œ dagegen nur das MilitÃ¤r. Vor 250 Jahren, am 14. Juni 1775, hob der Kontinentalkongress im laufenden UnabhÃ¤ngigkeitskrieg zehn Kompanien aus. Der spÃ¤tere US-PrÃ¤sident George Washington wurde zum Oberbefehlshaber der so gebildeten Kontinentalarmee ernannt.
Damit ist die US-Armee sogar Ã¤lter als die USA selbst. Die wurde nÃ¤mlich erst am 4. Juli 1776 mit Unterzeichnung der UnabhÃ¤ngigkeitserklÃ¤rung ins Leben gerufen. Noch jÃ¼nger ist Donald Trump. Der feiert am 14. Juni 2025 erst seinen 79. Geburtstag und ist damit nach
Joe Biden der zweitÃ¤lteste amtierende PrÃ¤sident in der 250 Jahre dauernden Geschichte der USA. Sollte er seine Amtszeit beenden, wÃ¼rde Trump seinen VorgÃ¤nger noch Ã¼berholen, und mit dann 82 Jahren und sieben Monaten zum Ã¤ltesten US-Staatsoberhaupt der Geschichte werden. (dil)
